ABOUT ME

Having started out as a designer, I have a passion for building clean, modern, and captivating visual interfaces. My previous roles include turning mockups into pixel-perfect functional websites as well as customizing existing ones. I've worked in diverse development environments and easily adapt to different client needs.

Employment History

Contract Web Designer and Front-end Developer
LingoMod, LLC | 2016 - 2018

  • Implemented the client's branding guidelines by customizing and maintaining the design on their sites.
  • Customized the UI of the client's initial WordPress theme to reflect the rebranding of the company's eCommerce store.
  • Provided design guidelines and setup for an eCommerce site to standardize display of the product gallery.
  • Implemented an extensive modification of a pre-built theme and also maintained the client's main site, a legal translations agency.
  • Created custom WordPress plugins to integrate the clients' sites with specific needs such as customized search results and the integration of a newsletter subscription and third-party chat feature.

Technologies: WordPress, WooCommerce, PHP, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery

Contract Web Designer and WordPress Developer
Koshkonong, LLC | 2015 - 2018

  • Designed, developed, maintained, and consulted for the client’s WordPress websites.
  • Transformed high-fidelity mockups into fully-functional WordPress themes as well as extending the admin dashboard for ease of content management through custom post types, custom fields, custom plugins, and widgets specific to the site's needs.
  • Extended the client’s main site by designing and developing a paid membership section of online video courses, integrating contacts and membership information with a third-party CRM tool, InfusionSoft.
  • Designed and developed multiple landing pages for client's different online campaigns for webinars, promotions on products, and services.
  • Built an initial wireframe design and coded the final mockup into a WordPress theme for podcast sites; featuring an integration with the Libsyn podcast hosting service, show notes, transcriptions, and landing pages.
  • Assisted in multiple site deployments, migrations, and backups of client's websites.

Technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, PHP, WordPress Theme Development

Freelance Web Designer and Developer
Mauricio J Flores Web Design | 2015 - 2018

  • Designed and developed multiple websites for several clients with different needs, as an individual contractor for short- to mid-term projects.
  • Extended an existing website for Intermountain Pool Covers (2018) by creating additional pages which were designed to provide a complete profile of the company's two main products; the pages include an image with a tooltip UI and full-screen background videos.
  • Customized a premium theme for CassieSpencer.com (2017) to integrate the requested layouts and specific content needs to the site as well as working with pre-installed tools and plugins to enhance key parts of the site, such as home page banner slider and contact forms.
  • Transformed a high-fidelity mockup into custom WordPress theme with general pages as well as custom index pages for categorized index blog articles for NinjaSauce.co (2017).
  • Designed and built AaronfloresID.com's portfolio website as a custom WordPress themes along with custom dashboard features for the pages that showcased the categorized portfolio items with carousel image galleries.

Technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, WordPress, Photoshop
